name: Expanded Spell List
description: The Celestial lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you: 1st: Cure Wounds, Guiding Bolt; 2nd: Flaming Sphere, Lesser Restoration; 3rd: Daylight, Revivify; 4th: Guardian of Faith, Wall of Fire; 5th: Flame Strike, Greater Restoration.
